column4: how do i access my server when it is stored on dsl box>router>server   how do i access the server
how do i access my server when it is stored on dsl box>router>server   how do i access the server
forward ports on the router
to your server
how would i do this
what is the brand of the router
belkin 54g
what server you run on your PC(http, ftp..)
apache
belkin's utility is usually accesible at 192.168.2.1
keep in mind that many providers block default http port, so u will have to setup your server to use a different port
i no i asking one too many q's but what would i enter on the other browser to connect to this pc
if your apache server is set up already then u can access it from your local network in firefox http://ip_address_of_apache_server:80
but u have to configure your router to be able to access your server from outside
i want to acces it from a different network
ok
right, so u have to look carefully at your router and see if there's something about default config utility address
for belkins u can access configuration utility by going to 192.168.2.1
but it may be different
just look at your router it has to say there
thanks for you help always someone to help me in linux unlike windoze
if not, look at your own ip, if its something like 192.168.x.y then your router config is 192.168.x.1
